overview:
David is an entrepreneur and technical innovator. Most recently David co-founded TurnTide, which created the worldâ€™s first anti-spam router. Turntide was acquired by Symantec in 2004.

In 2001, David co-founded ePrivacy Group, which created programs, standards and products to protect the email marketing channel. The products David created helped email marketers increase response and conversion by protecting their trusted relationship with consumers.

In 1996, David co-founded InfoSec Labs, which helped Fortune 1000 companies safely and securely bring their businesses online. InfoSec Labs was acquired by SafeNet in 1999.
